fields.text: Thank you for calling No Means No Worldwide in San Francisco, where we work to create a rape-free world.
For information about our educational programs, press [INDEX].
To learn about our elementary school curriculum, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our education team for elementary programs.
To hear about our self-defense workshops, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our self-defense workshop coordinator.
To find out how you can donate or volunteer, press [INDEX].
To make a donation to support our mission, press [INDEX].
Thank you for your generosity. Please hold while we transfer you to our development team.
To inquire about volunteer opportunities, press [INDEX].
Thank you for your interest in volunteering. Please hold while we connect you to our volunteer coordinator.
